STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: The Ultimate Companion for Home Chefs
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it - hear from happy home cooks!
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has revolutionized my kitchen! The step-by-step recipes and videos make cooking a breeze.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a novice cook, I love how easy it is to find recipes for my skill level and dietary needs. No more stressful meal planning!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The shopping list feature saves me so much time and helps reduce food waste. This app is a kitchen must-have!
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our app for making foods.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What kind of recipes does the app offer?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app has an extensive library of recipes for all types of dishes - appetizers, main courses, desserts, and more. You'll find recipes for different cuisines, dietary needs, and skill levels.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Can I save my favorite recipes?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes, you can easily save any recipe to your personal favorites list within the app. This allows quick access to the dishes you love to make.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Does the app include step-by-step instructions?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely. Each recipe provides detailed, easy-to-follow step-by-step instructions along with photos or videos to guide you through the cooking process.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, most recipes allow you to scale ingredient amounts up or down to adjust for different serving sizes based on your needs.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there a meal planning feature?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, our app includes a meal planning calendar that allows you to plan out meals for the week or month. You can easily add recipes and generate grocery lists.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Discover delicious recipes and master cooking techniques with our intuitive app.
LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Master the Art of Culinary Creation
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Discover recipes, plan meals, and elevate your cooking skills with our intuitive app. Simplify your kitchen routine and impress your loved ones.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Explore new recipes and bring your kitchen to life with FoodCraft. Cook with passion, eat with joy.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Our easy-to-use interface allows you to craft delicious recipes with just a few taps. Combine ingredients, add instructions, and bring your culinary vision to life.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Access a vast collection of ingredients from around the world. Discover unique flavors and experiment with global cuisines to elevate your cooking game.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Keep your pantry fully stocked by generating shopping lists based on your recipes. Never run out of essential ingredients again.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Follow along with detailed, step-by-step instructions to ensure flawless execution of your recipes. Cooking has never been easier.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Cater to diverse dietary needs by filtering recipes based on preferences like vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and more. Enjoy delicious meals tailored to your lifestyle.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Share your culinary masterpieces with friends and family. Post mouthwatering photos, exchange recipes, and inspire others to explore the joys of cooking.
CTA_BODY: Discover endless possibilities in the kitchen with our innovative app for making delicious foods. Explore new recipes, experiment with flavors, and elevate your cooking skills to new heights.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Cook delicious meals easily at home
SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Discover delicious recipes and simplify your cooking routine
CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get in Touch with Our Culinary Experts
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let's cook up something delicious together!
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Tools to slice, dice and prepare
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Cooking App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What kind of recipes does the app offer?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app provides a vast collection of recipes spanning various cuisines, dietary preferences, and occasions. From quick weeknight meals to gourmet feasts, you'll find recipes to suit every taste and skill level.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How can I save my favorite recipes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: You can create a personal account and save your favorite recipes in your own digital cookbook. This feature allows you to easily access and organize your preferred dishes for future reference.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Does the app provide nutritional information?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, our app displays detailed nutritional information, including calories, macronutrients, and micronutrients, for each recipe. This information can help you make informed choices and plan balanced meals.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Can I adjust the serving sizes for recipes?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely! Our app allows you to easily scale the ingredient quantities up or down to match your desired number of servings, making it convenient to cook for larger groups or adjust for smaller households.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our app provides step-by-step instructions and helpful tips to guide you through creating delicious meals, no matter your skill level.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Explore a vast collection of recipes from different cuisines and cultures, expanding your culinary horizons with every dish.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Customize your meal plans based on dietary preferences, allergies, and favorite ingredients, ensuring every meal is tailored to your unique tastes.
